abstract: The Google chairman and former Apple board member, a longtime friend of Mr. Jobs, indicates that his legacy will include philanthropy.
snippet: The Google chairman and former Apple board member, a longtime friend of Mr. Jobs, indicates that his legacy will include philanthropy.
lead_paragraph: Eric Schmidt, the executive chairman of Google and a longtime friend and competitor of Steve Jobs, says Mr. Jobs's influence may yet be seen in new ways.

headline.main: Eric Schmidt: Still More to the Steve Jobs Story
